name: APPRENTICE
data: Come one, come all; Whether an apprentice or a novice, this event will reveal it all!!

name: BULLS 'n' BEARS
data:
Bang on, if you have a hang on stock/share market!!
Hit the bull's eye with your investment skills.

name: BREAKING NEWS
data:
Reporter, anchor or news maker; Explore each and every horizon and become a news breaker!

Through this event, let the hidden journalist come forth.

name: MR AND MS GATES
data: Ramp walking, dancing, singing, oratory; The name is self-explanatory. Who knows you might be the next Mr./Ms. Gates!

name: CHAI PE CHARCHA
data: Come let's discuss on all the burning issues out there and that too, why not over a cup of tea! Let your team work skills shine out in this group discussion event.

name: RUMINATIONS
data: Have a command on making your stand clear, then this event is all for you. Come and showcase your debating skills.

name: RHAPSODIZE
data: "Just a minute" will be sufficient to determine who's the winner of this extempore. Through your presentation skills, confidence, expression and content, let the hidden speaker unveil from within you.

name: WHO'S THE NEW GULLY BOY?
data: Feel the budding rapper inside you, come and rap in this event where language is a no bar. Who knows we might find the next gully boy!

name: WORDSWORTH / WORDPLAY
data: Put your vocab on toes with this event which includes quizzes, spell check and much more!

name: CALL MY BLUFF
data: Don't get bluffed with wrong dictionary meanings as it might cost you exciting goodies!

name: POWER COUPLE 2.0
data: Attendees should look forward to indulge in some fun pair activities.
